data.actual_result: The whole screen loads like some changes were made and a toast appears saying "Channel order updated". Similar thing happens when you try the repro steps when sorting a server.
data.short_description: While sorting any list, if you try to move the last element to the bottom or the topmost element to the top, the whole list loads for no reason.
data.steps_to_repro: - Long press on any server where you have manage channels permission. - Open server settings. - Click on "Channels". - Click on the three lines and select any option. - Try to move the channel at the bottom, down and lift your finger.
